courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Sophomore standing and ACE 100 or ECON 102.
description: Overview of management in the food and agribusiness sector. Major topics covered include: introduction to the food and agribusiness sector; the environment of the firm; fundamentals, structural design, and change in organizations; leadership, motivation, communication; and planning and control. Coverage is at the introductory level with a focus on textbook material and current issues. Prerequisite: Sophomore standing and ACE 100 or ECON 102.
label: Food and Agribusiness Mgt
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Animal Sciences or Technical Systems Management or Crop Sciences or Food Science & Human Nutrition or Agricultural Communications or Agricultural Leadership or Human Development & Family St or Natural Resrcs & Environ Sci or Agr & Consumer Economics or Agricultural & Biological Engr or Food & Agribusiness Management major(s) or minor(s).
